title: BETTER Mobile Security Announces Its New Release of Windows Configurator 2 for Apple iOS. Pre-Order for October 1 Release is Now Open
text:
BETTER Mobile Security (better.mobi) announced the release and pre-orders for their Windows Configurator 2 for Apple iOS Devices. Apple currently only provides a Mac OS X version of the configurator even though enterprises have been requesting a Windows version for years.
New York, NY (PRWEB) September 11, 2015
BETTER Mobile Security (better.mobi) announced the release and pre-orders for their Windows Configurator 2 for Apple iOS Devices at CTIA Super Mobility Conference . Apple currently only provides a Mac OS X version of the configurator even though enterprises have been requesting a Windows version for years.
Mobile offers businesses new opportunities for innovation and company success. In the field we see new devices as mobile point of sales, support for field engineers, education platforms, and other uses. Companies who use these need a solution that will help them to deploy the business apps, lock devices in predefined configuration, secure settings, and prevent changes and deviations. Furthermore, enterprises are required to secure the devices and consistently provision them across all devices, all while running a Windows machine.
“Our configurator does just that, it provides all the functionalities of Apple’s Configurator like supervision as well as our security suite of end point real time threat detection, device level security policies, etc.” said Senai Ahderom, CEO/Co-Founder at BETTER Mobile Security.
Filling the Gap:
BETTER solved the operational deployment challenge with an elegant and consistent solution providing enterprises that use Windows the capabilities to efficiently provision secure configurations to multiple devices. BETTER’s configurator eliminates redundant installations and successfully gives enterprises optimal output of each device. BETTER doesn’t leave security out of the provisioning process. When building the BETTER device blueprint, administrators can add all security policies and controls and then provision in one shot, adding the unmatched security that detects, responds, and prevents security vulnerabilities.
About Company:
BETTER offers an all-in-one mobile security platform that seamlessly integrates with any existing mobility solution. BETTER provides enterprises with complete endpoint visibility, security, and control with real time, self-protecting advanced mobile threat detection and prevention.
You can find more from our website at: http://www.better.mobi
